name: com.bluefoxgames.dialoguewindownode
description: Node for Visual Scripting and a system to display simple windows for game dialogues.

samples.description:
Contains sample scene with a dialogue graph and prefab of a dialogue window.

NOTE: After importing use 'Localization' package settings from sample. 
Or add use of 'English (United States) (en-US)' locale to your settings.
